articles.title: New evidence finds heart conditions extremely rare after COVID-19 vaccination
articles.description: Heart conditions myocarditis and pericarditis are extremely rare after COVID-19 mRNA vaccinations, a Canadian study found. The research suggests that spacing out second doses to 30 days may lower the risk of developing these conditions in men ages 12-29.
